{{cpp/title|put_time}}
{{cpp/io/manip/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=iomanip|since=c++11|
template&lt; class CharT &gt;
/*unspecified*/ put_time( const std::tm* tmb, const CharT* fmt );
}}

When used in an expression {{c|out &lt;&lt; put_time(tmb, fmt)}}, converts the date and time information from a given calendar time {{c|tmb}} to a character string according to [[#Format string|format string]] {{c|fmt}}, as if by calling {{lc|std::strftime}}, {{lc|std::wcsftime}}, or analog (depending on {{tt|CharT}}), according to the {{lc|std::time_put}} facet of the locale currently imbued in the output stream {{c|out}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|tmb|pointer to the calendar time structure as obtained from {{lc|std::localtime}} or {{lc|std::gmtime}}}}
{{par|fmt|pointer to a null-terminated {{tt|CharT}} string specifying the [[#Format string|format of conversion]]}}
{{par end}}

===Format string===
{{cpp/chrono/c/strftime format}}

===Return value===
{{cpp/io/manip/iomanip return value|put_time}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;ctime&gt;
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    std::time_t t = std::time(nullptr);
    std::tm tm = *std::localtime(&amp;t);
    
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("ru_RU.utf8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "ru_RU: " &lt;&lt; std::put_time(&amp;tm, "%c %Z") &lt;&lt; '\n';
    
    std::cout.imbue(std::locale("ja_JP.utf8"));
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "ja_JP: " &lt;&lt; std::put_time(&amp;tm, "%c %Z") &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
ru_RU: Ср. 28 дек. 2011 10:21:16 EST
ja_JP: 2011年12月28日 10時21分16秒 EST
}}
